name: Gotham Square Garden
description: A central location in Gotham City known for hosting major events, including political debates.

content.title: History
content.body: Gotham Square Garden is a large indoor arena located in the heart of Gotham City. It has been the site of major events, including sports, concerts, and political activities, enhancing its reputation as a significant venue in the city's sociocultural landscape.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Situated within the bustling metropolis of Gotham City, Gotham Square Garden is surrounded by the city's skyscrapers and lies at a central position accessible from various city areas, encapsulating the city's blend of urban culture and chaos.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: The arena is known for its expansive seating capacity and state-of-the-art facilities. It has been designed to cater to large crowds, making it an ideal venue for high-profile events and gatherings.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: In 'The Batman (2022),' Gotham Square Garden plays a pivotal role when it becomes the location for the climactic mayoral debate. The venue is a target for The Riddler's schemes, marking it as a crucial point in the movie's narrative and showcasing Batman's efforts to thwart the villain's plans.
